snippet: The Canada Pension Plan Investment Board said on Friday that it would vote for a slate of directors at the Canadian Pacific Railway's annual meeting being proposed by the activist investor William A. Ackman.
abstract: The Canada Pension Plan Investment Board said on Friday that it would vote for a slate of directors at the Canadian Pacific Railway's annual meeting being proposed by the activist investor William A. Ackman.

headline.main: Canadian Pension Fund Backs Ackman in Proxy Fight
